textBox.richText: Oh jegus what was i thinking

Silly me, posting lyrics vaguely pertaining to how I am feeling when those emotions should not be expressed at this point in time. Now, you may be thinking “oh jeez what DID he mean by those wurdz?!?”, or you may have some idea as to what they meant but PUT THOSE THOUGHTS OUT OF YOUR HEAD UNTIL THE MOMÉNT ARISES. Ugh. I feel all subdued right now; i.e., I know of events that shall pass and they can turn either way: one direction is good, and one direction ends slowly in a dismal demise of fate. (Yes, I killed the alliteration there. Oh well). And all whilst coping internally with the juicy details mentioned in the previous ¶, I must trudge and toil through Work. Ah, yes; work. Glorious work. None of that was sarcasm of course because I am making oodles upon oodles of boondollars at work (please to be clicking on the term for a visual explanation in case you do not understand what I am referring to. Which you don’t). But, alas, this all ends once it is time to return to school; which, of course, isn’t my school anymore. That got shut down. But that’s old news and I must move on. Hopefully new opportunities will arise over at the joyous Stony Brook Campus. (After all, I do get to become a Saxophonist once again. Which reminds me, I should practice). I just wonder how many of my newly-made acquaintances in Southampton will stay at “main” campus in the proceeding years… Why, oh why, do I have a bad feeling about this. Oooohhh weell. This (potentially) won’t be the first time I’d have to start all over with something. (Did I just allude to something there? :o Are you getting pissed off that I am alluding to Paragraph [¶] One up there: the very thing I do not wish to divulge right now but continue to hint at because it is bothering me so much?!?!?) *Sigh* So, look at this; I just realized this is another one of those serious (albeit less angry) posts. I do guess I need some o‘ these from time to time, though. I mean, that’s what makes this a Blog, amirite? Well, alright; I’m done venting what I need to. Now I am going to go off to sleep, and dream about who knows what, in order to prepare for Work tomorrow!!! …At least tomorrow’s Friday. I can look forward to the weekend after that, despite not knowing what shenanigans will occur as of yet. <3 Always (lolwut), –Doyleboy
